House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03627
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 4200 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS 'AN ACT TO PROHIBIT AND PENALIZE WIRE TAPPING AND OTHER RELATED VIOLATIONS OF THE PRIVACY OF COMMUNICATION', AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PINEDA, ENRICO A., ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L., Ph.D.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-14
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-10-04
          -Initial Consideration with HBs 3406, 3733, 4151, 289, 587, 1868 & 3616
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-01-29
          -First TWG meeting - Discussion/Consolidation of the measures amending RA 4200 with HBs 3406, 3733, 4151, 289, 587, 1868 & 3616
      3. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-19
          -Second TWG meeting - continuation of the discussion/consolidation of the measures amending RA 4200 with HBs 3406, 3733, 4151, 289, 587, 1868 & 3616
      4. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-03-12
          -Third TWG meeting - continuation of the discussion/consolidation of the measures amending RA 4200 with HBs 3406, 3733, 4151, 289, 587, 1868 & 3616
      5. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-05-16
          -Fourth TWG meeting - continuation of the discussion/consolidation of the measures amending RA 4200 with HBs 3406, 3733, 4151, 289, 587, 1868 & 3616
      6. Recommendations submitted by the TWG on 2018-05-28
          -Fifth TWG meeting - continuation of the discussion/consolidation of the measures amending RA 4200 with HBs 3406, 3733, 4151, 289, 587, 1868 & 3616
      7. Measure approved by the Committee on 2018-08-14
          -Consideration of the Substitute Bill Amending RA 4200 with HBs 3406, 3733, 4151, 289, 587, 1868 & 3616
      8. Committee Report approved on 2018-08-30
          -Approval of the Committee Report with HBs 3406, 3733, 4151, 289, 587, 1868 & 3616
      9. Committee Report filed on 2018-10-08
